RTCRtpScriptTransform.summary: The RTCRtpScriptTransform interface of the WebRTC API is used to insert a WebRTC Encoded Transform (a running in a worker thread) into the WebRTC sender and receiver pipelines.

RTCRtpScriptTransformRTCRtpScriptTransfo.summary: The RTCRtpScriptTransform() constructor creates a new object.

remarks.para: Constructing the RTCRtpScriptTransform creates a counterpart in the specified worker, along with passed options (if any). Objects in the third parameter to the constructor are transferred.

The event is then fired at the worker global object.
Worker code can use the event.transformer property to get the counterpart , and event.transformer.options is used to get the options.
Note that the options are primarily used to inform the worker whether the transformer is processing incoming or outgoing frames, so that it can apply an appropriate transform.
